description: A classroom teacher introduces a student for show-and-tell. The student is presenting a jar containing a severed human head, which he states he found on the beach. The mundane setting of the classroom contrasts sharply with the horrific nature of the object, creating dark humor. The teacher's casual demeanor while introducing this item underscores the absurdism. This surreal scenario plays on the typical childhood activity of show-and-tell with a gruesome and unexpected twist.
caption: “And next, for show-and-tell, Bobby Henderson says he has something he found on the beach last summer. ...”
